#summary A better JFileChooser

You can filter the file list by input some text in the textbox on the upper right corner.

To use this dialog, just change your look and feel to :
{{{
try {
    UIManager.setLookAndFeel("com.petersoft.white.PetersoftWhiteLookAndFeel");
} catch (Exception e) {
    e.printStackTrace();
}
}}}
